Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the darkness of the country it is easy to see abnormal lights. This light put off the same illumination as the moon which was full at the time. It was just hovering in btween airplane tracfiic andthe clouds. It actually became transparent during passing of the aircraft. I marked its place in te air using landscape and went into the house.Ten minutes later I came bac and it had move up and over but not far. i watched for maybe 25 more minutes then all of a sudden it jus zipped off, as if it were slung from a sling shot . thats wen i realized it was what i thought it was an alien drone.
Summary: I noticed a bright light, watch it for a while ,went inside came bac it had moved .I watched for another 15 minutes until it asended
